title: maxtra
author: maxtra
created_time: August 16, 2022, 08:20:04 PMLast edit: January 22, 2023, 08:36:23 AM by maxtra
content: Hello everyoneThe platform is almost ready and will be deployed before the final ICO round so players can play games soon after the DEX listing. Why I'm looking for advisors:  I think bitcointalk is the best place to find experts with real expertise.To help with our private sale round.To guide us if we are making mistakes.To help us with low-cost & best resources.To help with regulations, taxation [Casino Startup] For better networking for future prospectsAfter commenting on the thread, please join telegram of https://t.me/+tP9XWj7k97I1ZDYxAlso, feel free to ask your questions, if any.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: it would be good if you could introduce yourself a little better here. very recently we had drama with a startup casino (Bitlucy), where a prominent member has pretty much damaged his reputation here because of many promises by the casino owner.Starting a casino business is not for people without money in their pocket. Considering that you start the token sale first, does that mean that it is actually fundraising for the casino bankroll?

comments.author: maxtra
comments.created_time: August 16, 2022, 10:09:47 PMLast edit: August 28, 2022, 07:48:52 AM by maxtra
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on August 16, 2022, 09:10:10 PMStarting a casino business is not for people without money in their pocket. Considering that you start the token sale first, does that mean that it is actually fundraising for the casino bankroll?That's true, but we aren't going to launch a big casino, neither we want to raise millions of dollars. Our platform will be small, with 12-15 small betting games like crash, flipping and similar level games; later, we will keep improving it.

comments.author: maxtra
comments.body: Write on this thread about your concerns or ask me anything about project..
